thread.title: Greater New York Watch

author: wsjcom
title: Greater New York Watch
text:
Manhattan Sinatra Will Be Focus of Geffen Hall Gala The campaign to renovate the New York Philharmonic’s home will make Frank Sinatra the focus of its first fundraiser.
The Dec. 3 gala, at the newly renamed David Geffen Hall at Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts, will celebrate Sinatra’s music and his centennial (Dec. 12). Lincoln Center and...
